unnormalised: Hey guys, awesome post! Been following Virat Kohli's training, and it's insane. Remember Dr. Sharma at NIS, Patiala always emphasized strength training. I'm trying to incorporate more yoga, like they do in Rishikesh. Need a bigger gym though, mine is only like 200 sq ft! Spending a fortune on protein supplements, around Rs. 5,000/month! Hoping to run a 10 km race soon.
normalised: Hey guys, awesome post! Been following V I R A T Kohli's training, and it's insane. Remember Doctor Sharma at N I S, Patiala always emphasized strength training. I'm trying to incorporate more yoga, like they do in Rishikesh. Need a bigger gym though, mine is only like two hundred square feet!
